name: coinbase_position_builder_bot
description: Position Building Bot for Accumulating Bitcoin (or other assets) via Coinbase Pro, while taking advantage of pumps

scripts.backtest_2021_100: CPBB_TEST_NAME=backtest_2021_100 CPBB_TEST_START=2021-01-01 CPBB_APY=100 ./node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --testPathIgnorePatterns=/node_modules/ --verbose -- test/backtest.test.js && echo '✅ Backtest 2021, 100% APY'

scripts.backtest_brendan: VERBOSE_TEST=true CPBB_TEST_NAME=brendan CPBB_BRUT_FORCE=true CPBB_TEST_START=2020-06-01 CPBB_APY=100 CPBB_VOL=28 CPBB_RATE_INTERVAL=hourly CPBB_RATE_INTERVAL_MOD=2 CPBB_REBUY_CANCEL=52560000 CPBB_RESELL_CANCEL=52560000 CPBB_REBUY_REBUILD=52560000 CPBB_RESELL_REBUILD=52560000 CPBB_REBUY='.0001@3,.0001@6,.0001@9,.0009@12' CPBB_RESELL='.0001@3,.0001@6,.0001@9,.0009@12' CPBB_RESELL_MAX=14 CPBB_REBUY_MAX=14 ./node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --testPathIgnorePatterns=/node_modules/ --verbose -- test/backtest.test.js && echo '✅ Backtest Broken'
